author: ETA PRIME
description:
Valve just announced a brand new lineup of Steam hardware — including the Steam Frame VR headset, a redesigned Steam Controller, and most exciting of all, their upcoming Steam Machine.
This small-form-factor PC runs official SteamOS and promises 4K 60 FPS gaming with FSR, powered by a semi-custom AMD Zen 4 + RDNA 3 APU. With built-in power, quiet cooling, RGB notifications, and full Steam Deck-style suspend/resume features — this could finally be Valve’s true living-room gaming console.
In this video, I break down everything Valve just revealed: specs, features, pricing rumors, and why this might be the perfect middle ground between a Steam Deck and a gaming PC.

Learn More Here: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/hardware

title: Valve’s New Steam Machine Is Finally Happening!

author: ETA PRIME
description:
In this video, we’re pushing the limits of the ROG Ally X by pairing it with the brand-new 2025 ROG xG Mobile Thunderbolt 5 eGPU Dock — and this thing is absolutely insane. Inside is a full RTX 5090 Laptop GPU with 24 GB of VRAM, built-in power supply, PD charging, and dual Thunderbolt 5 ports.
This is the most powerful external GPU ASUS has ever released, and it takes the Ally X to an entirely new level. We’ll cover setup, connection speeds, benchmarks, and real-world gaming performance. Spoiler: the results are wild.
